name: part_000
file: tmp_【#天音かなた3DLIVE】僕が主役でもいいですか？【ホロライブ】 [8lkam88qeZw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening sequence featuring a title card and a timeline of Amane Kanata's activities over her first year since debut.
Artist name reveal and 1st Anniversary Live title sequence.
Intro for the song 'Ghost Rule' with stylized text overlays and Amane Kanata appearing on stage to greet the audience.
Live performance of the song 'Ghost Rule'.

subtitles.original: 天音かなた 1st Anniversary LIVE
subtitles.english: Amane Kanata 1st Anniversary LIVE

subtitles.original: Let's get started.
subtitles.english: Let's get started.

subtitles.original: お待たせしましたー！
subtitles.english: I've kept you waiting!

subtitles.original: 1周年記念、天音かなた、よろしくねー！
subtitles.english: My 1st anniversary, I'm Amane Kanata! Best regards!

subtitles.original: どうだっていい言を　嘘って吐いて戻れない
subtitles.english: Words that don't matter, I spat them out as lies and can't go back

subtitles.original: 時効なんてやってこない　奪ったように奪われて
subtitles.english: The statute of limitations will never come, being robbed just as I robbed others

subtitles.original: 今日だって叶わない　思ったように騙せない
subtitles.english: Even today, it won't come true, I can't deceive as I intended

subtitles.original: 腐っている僕には　腐ったものがわからない
subtitles.english: For someone as rotten as me, I can't tell what's rotten anymore

subtitles.original: おいで　ココまで
subtitles.english: Come here, this far

subtitles.original: 成れ！！
subtitles.english: Become!!

subtitles.original: 隠して仕舞ったんだ
subtitles.english: I ended up hiding it all away

subtitles.original: メーデー僕と判っても
subtitles.english: Mayday, even if you realize it's me

subtitles.original: 抱き締めなくていいんだよ
subtitles.english: You don't have to hold me tight

subtitles.original: メーデー僕が解ったら
subtitles.english: Mayday, if you understand me

subtitles.original: もう一度嘲笑ってくれるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you'll laugh at me once more

subtitles.original: Wow Wow Wow...
subtitles.english: Wow Wow Wow...

subtitles.original: 魔物だって知るんだよ
subtitles.english: Knowing that I'm just a monster

subtitles.original: Wow Wow Wow...
subtitles.english: Wow Wow Wow...

subtitles.original: 嘘つきだって知るんだよ
subtitles.english: Knowing that I'm just a liar

subtitles.original: ねえ
subtitles.english: Hey

subtitles.original: 戻ったはずが　キョドってYESを声に出す
subtitles.english: I thought I'd returned, but I awkwardly shout 'YES' aloud

subtitles.original: 後悔の脆弱は　騙したほうが正義なの
subtitles.english: The fragility of regret, is it justice to be the one who deceives?

subtitles.original: 卑怯だって構わない　祈っておいてそれはない
subtitles.english: I don't care if I'm a coward, I prayed for it, but it's not like that

subtitles.original: 飾っていた饒舌が　墓穴を掘って焼ける様
subtitles.english: The eloquence I'd been flaunting, is like digging my own grave and burning

subtitles.original: 負い目　どこまで
subtitles.english: Debt, how much further?

subtitles.original: 灰色！！
subtitles.english: Gray!!

subtitles.original: 被害者ヅラしたんだ
subtitles.english: I played the victim

subtitles.original: メーデー僕を叱ってよ
subtitles.english: Mayday, please scold me

subtitles.original: 正直者が夢見たなら
subtitles.english: If an honest person were to dream

subtitles.original: メーデー僕を裁いてよ
subtitles.english: Mayday, please judge me

subtitles.original: 最後まで甘えてしまうのは
subtitles.english: Indulging myself until the very end is...

subtitles.original: Wow Wow Wow...
subtitles.english: Wow Wow Wow...

subtitles.original: 幽霊だって知るんだよ
subtitles.english: Knowing that I'm just a ghost

subtitles.original: Wow Wow Wow...
subtitles.english: Wow Wow Wow...

subtitles.original: 空白だって知るんだよ
subtitles.english: Knowing that I'm just a void

subtitles.original: ねえ
subtitles.english: Hey

subtitles.original: 足りないものを望んだら　僕じゃない僕に出会ったよ
subtitles.english: If I wish for what I lack, I encountered a 'me' that wasn't me

subtitles.original: それでも前に進んだの　クラクラしちゃう夜も
subtitles.english: Even so, I moved forward, even through dizzying nights
